name: Pick Me Up
author: Hermod &#40헤르모드&#41
content: 1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss&#039 attack patterns.That was Seojin Han&#039s philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he&#039s got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
